meaning_str.bing:
n. 大小；号；尺码；浆料
v. 上浆；标定…的大小；确定…的尺寸；改变…的大小
网络. 规格；规模；商品尺码

上浆；标定…的大小；确定…的尺寸；改变…的大小

尺寸；大小；规模；量度；尺码；号码；体积；大量；大规模；能力；能耐；浆糊；粘合剂；粘合度；（用于绘画的）底料
标定…的大小；确定…的尺寸；调整…的尺寸；改变…的大小；估算…的大小；测量…的大小；上胶料；上浆；上涂料
特定大小的；规定大小的；一定大小的；某一尺寸的

1.en: The size of the calamity raises the question of whether small countries can really afford bank bailouts.
1.cn: 这场灾难的规模如此之大，令人不禁要问，一些小国真的负担得起救助银行的成本吗？

2.en: It have been found that there was a certain relation between the dyeing properties and crystal phase, particle size of acid dyes.
2.cn: 试验表明酸性染料的染色性能与染料的晶相和粒子大小有着一定的关系。

3.en: When you observe that, reduce the size of your trades and spend more time with your Trader's Journal figuring out what you're doing.
3.cn: 当你注意到了这些时，减少你的交易，多花时间在交易日记上，搞清楚你在做什么。

0.en: You have an average size home and an average community, and you decide to upgrade.
0.cn: 你有个普通大小的房子，普通大小的社区，你决定住的再高级一点。

1.en: I thought it has to do with the size of a guy's feet.
1.cn: 我认为那东西跟自己脚的大小相等。

2.en: This needs to prove until it has at least doubled in size.
2.cn: 然后再醒面，知道变成原来两倍大小。

3.en: Cities have been built to a size and scale not matched in any previous period in world history.
3.cn: 建成城市的大小和规模前无古人。

4.en: And they're willing to pay extra to get that particular size onion.
4.cn: 他们愿意付出额外的金钱。来得到那个完美大小的洋葱。

5.en: He has enough toys. I mean, all I wanted to do was touch the life-size barbie.
5.cn: 他的玩偶这么多呢，我想摸一下真人大小的芭比娃娃都不行。

6.en: But just imagine, a soldier the size of an insect. The ultimate secret weapon.
6.cn: 不过设想一下，一个昆虫般大小的战士，一件终极秘密武器。

7.en: Why do you even want this here? Its size is completely disproportionate to its purpose.
7.cn: 你怎么会想把这东西弄来这儿？它的大小与用途完全不成比例。

8.en: Is she prettier than I am? No. Does size matter? No. And it works both ways.
8.cn: “她比我漂亮吗？”，“不”“大小重要吗？”，“不”这点男女都适用。

9.en: She stole Landau from you. How is it you can lurk in an office the size of a phone booth?
9.cn: 她偷走了朗度。你怎么能成功潜藏在一个电话亭大小的办公室里的？

10.en: These shrimp are all the same size. There's no the logical order to eat them in. Can't be very long.
10.cn: 这几个虾仁大小都一样，吃的时候都找不到一个有逻辑的次序。没多久了。

11.en: Great. We found a cooling solution that allowed us to get the size of the prototype down to the target specs.
11.cn: 很好。我们研究出一个冷却方案可以让原型机的大小缩小至目标规格。

12.en: Two hundred light-years away, there is a Saturn-size planet orbiting, not one, but two stars.
12.cn: 距离两百光年的地方，有一颗土星大小的行星绕着，不是一颗，而是两颗恒星运行。

13.en: The first time, you leave it at room temperature until it has at least doubled in size, which will take about two hours.
13.cn: 第一次放在室温下，知道体积至少变成原来的两倍大小，这会需要两个小时左右。

14.en: The Yellowjacket is an all-purpose weapon of war capable of altering the size of the wearer for the ultimate combat advantage.
14.cn: 黄蜂战衣是一种全能的战争武器，可以改变穿戴者的大小以获得终极的战斗优势。

15.en: Hey, guys, bad news. I just did a quick calculation. Given the size of the theater and the length of this line, we might not get seats.
15.cn: 伙计们，坏消息，我刚刚算了一下，根据电影院的大小和队伍的长度我们可能没座位了。

16.en: Hey, Dwight. Ma'am. So, did they just happen to have this costume lying around in your size? Weirdly, they did.
16.cn: 你好，德怀特。女士你好。所以他们这么刚好家里有这件符合你大小的制服吗？虽然很诡异，但确实如此。

17.en: Kepler's objective is very simple. It's to determine the fraction of stars in our galaxy that harbor potentially habitable Earth-size planets.
17.cn: 开普勒的目标很简单。就是确定我们星系的恒星部分确定在一个地球大小的星球，适合居住的可能性。

18.en: It's hard to tell because I'm sweating, but I use exactly what the gel bottle says, an amount about the size of a pea. How, how can that be too much?
18.cn: 我在冒汗，所以看不出来，但我完全遵照瓶上指示的用量，一颗豆子大小的份量而已，那怎么会太多呢？

19.en: Where's the fire and brimstone? Where's the part where you tell us we're going to Hell and I say have you seen the size of the bugs outside? We're already there!
19.cn: 炼狱之火那套说辞呢？还有你说我们会下地狱受折磨，然后我说你看看外面虫子的大小？我们早就在地狱了！
